summary: This is a replacer mod for the dawnguard armors. There is no .esp file so it will not go against your mod count.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Dawnguard Armor
Author: Edhildil
4,27,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=6]This mod is made just for fun.[/size][/color]

This is a replacer mod for the dawnguard armors. There is no .esp file so it will not go against your mod count. I didn't

like the vanilla ones so I made these replacers. This mod is not for everyone but at least its an option. Very skimpy; shows

a lot of skin, most likely not so lore friendly. Uses vanilla textures.

I made this from a custom body shape based off my DMRA mods from Oblivion. Due to the low tollerances (.007) larger than the

body, I most likely will not convert to any other body type. If somebody else wants to they can, just credit my work.

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty

[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

Out of the gate I altered the female boots and gloves body slots to function correctly with these armors. They now only use

the feet and hands slots respectively so as not to have invisible parts. This may cause issues in the wrists and shins if used with other armors.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]

Dawnguard DLC

Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)


Â 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete the included dawnguardbody files and the boots and gloves
in the data_meshes_dlc01_armor_dawnguard folder.


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the armor


Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also

be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
